name: Moving square
description:
In the Moving Square, we hope the players can try their best to solve the missions in game. When we are designing this game, we adding many small elements to let players think out loud. Our puzzle script game is clean and simple. The player doesn’t need to check the rule. They just need to play one game, then they will know how this game work.

Rules

Our game rules are simple, the player is the red human, they need to move the red square on the blue square. When the player move they won’t stop until they hit the wall. Therefore, the player needs to use the wall to let player stop on the blue square.
